snippet: Japan's largest publicly trade life insurer, Dai-ichi Life, has agreed to buy as much as 20 percent of the United States mutual fund company Janus Capital Group, Reuters reports.
abstract: Japan's largest publicly trade life insurer, Dai-ichi Life, has agreed to buy as much as 20 percent of the United States mutual fund company Janus Capital Group, Reuters reports.

headline.main: Dai-ichi Buys Big Stake in Janus Capital
